MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH1 postcode area of Chester, affecting properties in Higher Ferry Lane, Sealand Road, Deeside Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at 1:46PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of work required and an additional fault found on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:45PM on Sunday 11th April 2021.
